AAW.caption: email
AAW.doc: (string): Email address of the user who is logged in.
AAW.name: email

AAX.caption: unique id
AAX.doc: (string): set a value for users for which you have an internal identification value, such as a user ID or a token.
AAX.name: unique_id

AAY.caption: name
AAY.doc: (string): set a user name. Must be in lowercase letters and should not contain any special characters or blank spaces.
AAY.name: name

AAZ.caption: image
AAZ.doc: (string): provide an image URL to be uploaded for the user.
AAZ.name: image

AAa.caption: weight
AAa.doc: (int {1-10}): weighting gives you the ability to make feedback and interaction of one user (e.g. high revenue users) more important than others. The weighting is also used to calculate the impact score.
AAa.name: weight
